definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: I tune in to the film channal every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚都收看電影頻道。
這些碼流就被稱爲子頻道。

sentences.english: There is more and more choices of TV channels, and TVB is no longer the only option.
sentences.chinese: 現在電視頻道越來越多，翡翠臺不再是唯一的選擇。

sentences.english: For the next few years at least, the fourth channel is a dead duck.
sentences.chinese: 過不了幾年，第四頻道一定會辦不下去的。

sentences.english: The situation comedy is going to start soon, just switch to channel one.
sentences.chinese: 情景喜劇馬上就要開播了，快調到一頻道。

sentences.english: Will I'm so bored I could watch the shopping channel. At least the hostess is hot.
sentences.chinese: 威爾我無聊到寧可看購物頻道，至少女主持人很辣。

sentences.english: Of course we see American channel and Arab states channels. I saw your last albom.
sentences.chinese: 當然我們也能看到美國或阿拉伯國家的頻道。

sentences.english: Dream House is to show the back of HGTV Entertainment in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 夢之家是一個展示在居家頻道娛樂製作正午在美國。

sentences.english: They also face the challenge of competing against more risque fare available on cable channels, such as HBO.
sentences.chinese: 他們也面臨與有線電視頻道上更多所帶來的挑戰。

sentences.english: Among 50 TV channels, I like the Film Channel best.
sentences.chinese: 在50多個頻道中，電影臺是我最喜歡看的。

sentences.english: they reveal that their public communication channels are open.
sentences.chinese: 他們的“公共社交頻道”總是向所有人敞開着的。

sentences.english: Mom loves to watch home-shopping channels.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽很喜歡看家庭購物頻道。

sentences.english: My father loves watching Channel Five, because he likes sports.
sentences.chinese: 我的爸爸最愛看頻道五，因爲他喜歡體育。

sentences.english: In this channel, they include items for Web pages they want to promote.
sentences.chinese: 在這個頻道中包含了關於希望宣傳的網頁的一些項。

sentences.english: And he burns holes in your skin with his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 天氣頻道說暴露的皮膚會在三分鐘內被凍傷。

sentences.english: The pay-per-view channel will be charged to your room.
sentences.chinese: 按次計費的頻道費用會加到您的房間費用裏面。

definition: broadcast/CL:個|个[ge4]/broadcasting/to broadcast/(formal) to propagate/to publicize
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
iQiyi, online video platform based in Beijing, launched in 2010
network (computer, telecom)/Internet/Taiwanese term for 網絡|网络[wang3 luo4]
